birthplace: Annika Rogers joined Nolo in 2009 and now leads its engineering team. Before coming to Nolo, she worked on web-based software for more than 15 years as a senior engineer, engineering manager and consultant for several Bay Area companies and institutions.
overview:
Michael Johnson joined PodTech in 2006, playing a pivotal role on its production and corporate relations team. Before coming to PodTech, he worked as a training consultant with Western Public Radio (WPR), National Public Radio (NPR), and the Association of Independents in Radio (AIR); served as General Manager of KALW-FM, and subsequently worked with the radio staff of KQED-FM as senior producer, and training manager. He earned his broadcasting degree at San Francisco State University.

He currently works with international technology companies producing ad directing marketing podcasts.
